message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product, which I know will be incredibly valuable to your business. My asking price is $1,150,000. This reflects the high quality and potential of the product. I'm confident it will be a very worthwhile investment for you.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was hoping to negotiate a better price. I'm willing to pay $1,100,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and my budget.

Bob, I understand your position and appreciate your interest.  While $1,100,000 is a good offer, I'm looking for a price closer to my initial asking price. Let's meet in the middle. I'm willing to drop my price to $1,125,000. This is a fair compromise that allows us both to benefit from this transaction.  Let me know if you're willing to consider this.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to pay $1,075,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the market value and my budget. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle again.
